name: name
password_validation_messages: Password must be at least 8 characters and must contain at least one uppercase , one lowercase letter and at least one digit
username_validation_messages: Username must be at least 8 characters and must contain only letters, digits, dash and/or underscore

errors.min_length: The %{field} field must be at least %{min} characters long
errors.max_length: The %{field} field must not exceed %{max} characters
errors.invalid_name: Name must be at least 8 chars and must contain only letters, spaces
errors.invalid_username: Username must be at least 8 chars and must contain only letters, digits, dash or underscoore
errors.invalid_password: Password must be at least 8 chars and must contain only letters, digits and at least one capital , one small charactar and at least one digit
errors.email_exists: This email is already in use
errors.invalid_credentials: These credentials do not match ours
